statements: SELECT * FROM DanceCompetitionScores;
SELECT participant_name, score FROM DanceCompetitionScores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT participant_name, ranking FROM DanceCompetitionScores WHERE score > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM DanceCompetitionScores WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM DanceCompetitionScores ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, score, ranking FROM DanceCompetitionScores WHERE ranking <= 3 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, score, ranking FROM DanceCompetitionScores WHERE score BETWEEN 80 AND 90 ORDER BY ranking;
SELECT * FROM DanceCompetitionScores WHERE score > 95 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, score FROM DanceCompetitionScores WHERE score < 70 ORDER BY participant_name, score DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM DanceCompetitionScores;
SELECT * FROM competition_scores WHERE round = 1;
SELECT participant_id, score FROM competition_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT participant_id, total_score FROM rankings WHERE ranking <= 10;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM competition_scores;
SELECT * FROM competition_scores WHERE participant_id = 1001;
SELECT participant_id, score, round FROM competition_scores WHERE score > 50 ORDER BY round DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT participant_id, total_score, ranking FROM rankings WHERE ranking <= 5 ORDER BY total_score ASC;
SELECT participant_id, score, round FROM competition_scores WHERE round = 1 OR round = 2 ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT participant_id, total_score, ranking FROM rankings WHERE ranking > 3 AND total_score BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT participant_id, total_score, ranking FROM rankings WHERE participant_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY ranking ASC;
SELECT * FROM DanceCompetitors;
SELECT competitor_name, dance_style FROM DanceCompetitors WHERE score > 90;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM DanceEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, event_name, rank FROM DanceCompetitors c JOIN DanceRanks r ON c.competitor_id = r.competitor_id;
SELECT competitor_name, rank FROM DanceCompetitors c JOIN DanceRanks r ON c.competitor_id = r.competitor_id WHERE rank <= 3;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, dance_style, score FROM DanceCompetitors ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, score FROM DanceCompetitors WHERE score > 90;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM DanceEvents WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT competitor_name, event_name, rank FROM DanceCompetitors JOIN DanceRanks ON DanceCompetitors.competitor_id = DanceRanks.competitor_id;

SELECT event_name, event_location, competitor_name, rank FROM DanceEvents JOIN DanceRanks ON DanceEvents.event_id = DanceRanks.event_id JOIN DanceCompetitors ON DanceRanks.competitor_id = DanceCompetitors.competitor_id ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT * FROM Competition;
SELECT dancer_name, dancer_style FROM Dancer ORDER BY dancer_name ASC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_expertise FROM Judge WHERE judge_expertise = 'Hip-Hop';
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM Competition WHERE competition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT d.dancer_name, j.judge_name, s.score FROM Dancer d INNER JOIN Score s ON d.dancer_id = s.dancer_id INNER JOIN Judge j ON s.judge_id = j.judge_id ORDER BY s.score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Competition;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM Competition ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT dancer_name, dancer_style FROM Dancer WHERE dancer_style='Ballet';
SELECT judge_name, judge_expertise FROM Judge WHERE judge_expertise LIKE '%Hip Hop%';

SELECT competition_name, dancer_name, judge_name, score FROM Competition c JOIN Score s ON c.competition_id = s.competition_id JOIN Dancer d ON s.dancer_id = d.dancer_id JOIN Judge j ON s.judge_id = j.judge_id ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM dance_competition_scores;
SELECT competitor_id, dance_style, score FROM dance_competition_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT judge_name, expertise FROM judges WHERE expertise = 'Latin Dance';
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, country FROM competitors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT round_name, start_time FROM rounds ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM dance_competition_scores ORDER BY score DESC, competitor_id ASC
SELECT competitor_name, country FROM competitors WHERE country='USA' LIMIT 5
SELECT judge_name, expertise FROM judges WHERE expertise='Hip Hop'
SELECT ROUND(AVG(score), 2) AS avg_score FROM dance_competition_scores WHERE round_id=1
SELECT competitor_name, rank FROM competitors c INNER JOIN rankings r ON c.competitor_id=r.competitor_id ORDER BY rank ASC
